Class NewsAPIConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • NewsAPIConnector

  • public class NewsAPIConnector
extends java.lang.Object

    News API Connector

    The NewsAPIConnector class contains constructors and methods for connecting to NewsAPI to receive arrays of JSON Elements, then convert that JSON output into arrays of Article objects from the Article class.
    Since:
    13 April 2018
    Author:
    Aaron Wile, Chrissa LaPorte, Oriel Francis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NewsAPIConnector()
      The default NewsAPIConnector constructor creates a NewsAPIConnector object with currentTimeStamp set relative to the time at which the object is instantiated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStreamReader connect()
      The connect method establishes a connection to newsAPI based on the current url field and returns an InputStreamReader to read newsAPI's Json output.
      java.util.ArrayList<Article> getArticleArray()
      The getArticleArray method returns an ArrayList of Articles based on the NewsAPIConnection object's current url field.
      void updateTimeStamp()
      The updateTimeStamp method resets the currentTimeStamp String to the current Time and Date, formatted in ISO 8601 for NewsAPI, and sets the previousTimeStamp string to 1 hour prior.
      void updateURL()
      The updateURL method generates a new URL to request newsAPI's JSON output, based on the current state of the NewsAPIConnector's fields.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NewsAPIConnector

        public NewsAPIConnector()
        The default NewsAPIConnector constructor creates a NewsAPIConnector object with currentTimeStamp set relative to the time at which the object is instantiated. Additionally, previousTimeStamp is set to to 1 hour prior, pageNumber is set to 1, and apiIndex is set to 0. The constructor then combines these fields into a URL for connecting to newsAPI. This is accomplished through the class's updateTime and updateURL methods.

    • Method Detail

      • updateTimeStamp

        public void updateTimeStamp()
        The updateTimeStamp method resets the currentTimeStamp String to the current Time and Date, formatted in ISO 8601 for NewsAPI, and sets the previousTimeStamp string to 1 hour prior.

      • updateURL

        public void updateURL()
        The updateURL method generates a new URL to request newsAPI's JSON output, based on the current state of the NewsAPIConnector's fields.

      • connect

        public java.io.InputStreamReader connect()
        The connect method establishes a connection to newsAPI based on the current url field and returns an InputStreamReader to read newsAPI's Json output.
        Returns:
        An InputStreamReader to read from the current url field.

      • getArticleArray

        public java.util.ArrayList<Article> getArticleArray()
        The getArticleArray method returns an ArrayList of Articles based on the NewsAPIConnection object's current url field.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList populated by Article objects based on the data from newsAPI relative to the the current url field.
